title: Patch Notes
content:
closes theirs. Fixed the Dialogue UI sometimes disappearing for the listener when the dialogue owner selected a different character.

Fixed the position of the overflow indicator (the number that shows how many more conditions a character has set on them if there are too many to visualise) for Player 2 on split screen. Repositioned the Dual-Wield indicator on split screen. Tweaked the number of conditions that are shown. Set Player 2's race and class label to align right horizontally.

Multiplay
